channel.title: Is smoothwan support bigger I2C Oled screen?
channel.description: Hi, may i know if smoothwan support bigger I2C Oled screen. If yes, can you advise the model? thanks

item.title: Is smoothwan support bigger I2C Oled screen?
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
Hi, unfortunately OLED support has been dropped since the displays have poor longevity.
Next release includes MQTT reporting for all VPNs, and a display like M5 stack can be used via USB/Wi-Fi or other displays.
For the older version, yes they do support larger displays as long as they use the same chip “ssd1306”.

Read full topic
item.source: Is smoothwan support bigger I2C Oled screen?
